raw_text: FERNANDO – LAKSIRI – It is with great sorrow we announce the death of Laksiri Fernando (Past President & long standing Treasurer of Moratuwa Arts Forum (MAF)),​ beloved husband of Stephanie,​ much loved father of Nadinka and Anoushka,​ dearest father-in-law of Rashad,​ loving grandfather of Aanjali and Minuk,​ cherished brother of Lilangani and late Lakshini and dearest brother-in-law of Rohan,​ Lakdasa,​ Joe,​ Carlo,​ Angelo,​ late Cecelia and Flavia. Remains lie at residence,​ ‘Elrinda’,​ 120/​3,​ De Soysa Road,​ Rawatawatte,​ Moratuwa. Cortege leaves residence on Wednesday,​ 11th October 2023 at 3.30 pm,​ for Service and Burial at Queen of Angel’s Church,​ Rawatawatte at 4.00 pm.064898

PERERA – SURANGANI MENIQUE (nee WICKREMASINGHE) – Beloved mother of Anil (USA) and Tillak (Skyways Travel Solutions),​ mother-in-law of Ramona (USA) and Elorine,​ grandmother of Harshini (Aus),​ Arjun (USA) and Dimitri. Remains lie at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s from 10 a.m. from the 10th of October 2023. Funeral Service will be held on the 11th of October 2023 at 2 p.m. followed by Cremation at Borella Crematorium at 3 p.m.064654

SAMARAWICKRAMA – TAMARA – Dearly beloved wife of Nirmala Samarawickrama,​ loving mother of Dr Dilan Samarawickrama and Liyana Gomes,​ mother-in-law of Sal,​ adored grandmother of Malia,​ Karina,​ Adrian & Jaydon,​ daughter of late Richard and Daisy Samarasinghe of Galle,​ loving sister of late Dr Lalantha (Lal) Samarasinghe of New Jersey,​ USA,​ passed away on October 5,​ 2023 in Lakewood California,​ USA. Private funeral was held on October 9,​ 2023 according to her wishes in Altadena,​ California,​ USA.064714

WEERASINGHE ARTHUR SILVA (Rtd. Deputy Commissioner of Labour),​ beloved husband of late Indrani Weerasinghe,​ loving father of Dr Hemantha,​ Priyanka,​ Piumika and Nishadha,​ loving father-in-law of Dr Sujeewa,​ Adrian,​ Dr Channa and Dilhani,​ darling grandfather of Dr Hashan,​ Portia,​ Rommel,​ Dr Vidura and Chenuki,​ passed away peacefully on 09th October 2023. Remains lie at “The Restpect” Jayarathna Parlour,​ Borella from 8 a.m. on Thursday 12th October. Cortege will leave at 3.30 p.m. for the Funeral Service and Cremation at General Cemetery,​ Borella on Thursday,​ 12th October.064799
